Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory658.jpg'}
{3: 'This labyrinth poses no challenge to Luna—the barriers that once stopped another are now easily pushed aside.'}
{3: 'Just as Vonnegut said, this tower is no obstacle for agents.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Luna touches the incomplete Gate, she senses the dormant Punishing within it, flowing backward through time.'}
{3: "Could the Punishing from the past become a channel for communication if information were entrusted to the Gate's Punishing?"}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But humans were the ones who first controlled this tower... They can't read Punishing signals, and only one frame can be immune to Punishing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Even walking in this tower is a struggle... How did humans ever control it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Could it be related to that frame's structure?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna recalls her conversation with Vonnegut once again.'}
{3: "He used to be guarded and vague—now she understands his caution, having seen Cradle's ability to read memories."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "She closes her eyes, trying to read the flow of Punishing signals, but they're all blocked."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'The source of the blockade... the top of the tower?', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Luna orients herself, she senses an anti-Punishing core at the highest level, continuously suppressing the tower's original function."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This core must be maintaining the Clean Zone.', 4: '1'}
{3: "If she goes any higher, the power enhancing Luna's frame will start to fade."}
{3: "But Selene is there, and so is her goal—no matter what, she'll reclaim what's hers."}
{3: 'She hesitates no longer and strides toward her destination.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory300.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.5'}
{3: "Just as she's about to move forward, she notices a phantom made of Punishing beside the incomplete Gate."}
{3: "Ethereal orchids bloom amidst the crimson landscape—a clear sign of Selene's influence."}

{3: 'Since the Ascension-Network\'s re-filtering stripped away their freedom, Selene\'s voice has grown louder, using her stolen power to show Luna supposed visions of the future the Network "sees."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_01.jpg'}
{3: 'Selene sees it as either a test or the inevitable fate of those who defy their mission.'}
{3: "She insists that without embracing hatred, they'll all die in the future, leaving Luna alone to suffer."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_02.jpg'}
{3: 'In those visions, she always sees the snow orchids from her home.'}
{3: "Long ago, these were Luna's favorite flowers."}
{3: 'The memory of watching them sway by the window holds a special place in her heart.'}
{3: "The sound of rustling curtains, the warmth of the sun, her sister's call... These were her earliest memories."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: "After becoming an agent, Luna often searched the ruins for these flowers, but the results always matched Selene's visions."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_03.jpg'}
{3: 'They were just greenhouse flowers, nurtured by her mother and sister, like she was.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_01.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Without them, everything faded away, leaving no trace.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory658.jpg'}
{3: 'Before ascending to the next level, Luna takes one last look at the phantom image of the snow orchids.'}
{3: 'A chance to rewrite the past lies before her. If only it were possible...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory920.jpg'}
{3: "Selene, standing before the Gate closest to the core, painfully tears at Agent Zero, who's fused with her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Our goals should have been the same. Why?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "I don't understand either, but all I feel is pure, absolute ecstasy! Hahahaha!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "I'm the one meant to destroy everything, not someone's puppet!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Gestalt has corrupted you completely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "But don't forget—our goal is to complete the Gate and leave this era behind, entirely.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "Without the key, even if we complete the Gate, we can't escape this place as a whole.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: "Luna will be my key, but I won't let you return to the past. The corrupted memetic would weaken the Ascension-Network, and the information born of hatred would no longer manifest.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'Let me be clear: Even under my leadership, our goal remains the same—to destroy human civilization, wipe out those disgusting creatures, and build a world for those loyal to me.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'She clutches the writhing eyeball on her chest and begins to walk toward the door.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'The Gate must be completed.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'The Gate... must... be completed!', 4: '1'}
